message.body: Yes! I took my car to the mechanic today (an outside mechanic this time) so not sure if it will be ready in time. If it is, I can come and also drive
Okay cool! If you can't drive though it's super easy to come by train too :)
Hi! I'm so sorry but I can't make it tonight :( thank you for thinking of me though! I spent all evening at the mechanics but my car is better now I think
I will text about any upcoming events and we should def plan to do this upcoming first Friday
Aw okay! I'm gonna try and stop by on Sunday to last drop so I'll just see you then maybe?
Yes! No pressure but free pastries are YUM!
